translation.Name: <color=epic>EOD: Undead Upset</color>
translation.Description: With most of the human issues put away, it's time for the big issue - the undead issue.  We'll send in sweepers to clear out major issues out in most places - but we need you to clear out the zombies up at TKR Industrial.  Acquire a horde beacon to clear them out up there, and we'll handle the rest.
translation.Condition_0: Complete Horde Beacon at TKR Industrial {0}/1
